name: Rollcall
title: Android
summary: Rollcall is an Android application for rollcall teacher in university with many useful capability such as manage teachers, fast transaction, easy to use, parameterized report, ...
explain:
Rollcall is an Android application for rollcall teacher in university with many useful capability such as manage teachers, fast transaction, easy to use, parameterized report, import and export data from microsoft excel.

Project feature:

- Manage teachers

- Mange rollcall

- Communicate from microsoft excel and sqlite database

- Exported data filter by teacher and rollcall

This program currently used in shomal university.
